website_summaries.verdict: A pretty coaster set that will last if well-cared for. The best deal for the budget-minded.
pros: Fits a wide range of glass and cup sizes
About half the price of many competitors
cons: They may warp or stain if they get wet, but drying them frequently could help prevent this issue

customer_reviews.title: I bought these coz I figured they'd be a good alternative to paper napkins in my house
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought these coz I figured they'd be a good alternative to paper napkins in my house. What a complete waste of money; they are useless with cold drinks as they stick to the bottom of the glass when you pick it up. The first night I used them when I had dinner guests over, was a comedy sketch due to the ineffectiveness of the coasters... Perfectly fine for hot drinks, but not for iced beverages that condensate.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey from the Arctic

customer_reviews.title: I am totally not happy with these Coasters
customer_reviews.text: I am totally not happy with these Coasters. I have had them such a short time and they are already faded out and turning a light color where the glasses sit. I would not reorder this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Patty D.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! But off color and mine was damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I do really like these coasters. They look nice and feel nice, however they were much lighter than the photo/color we chose. It was supposed to match the end table but it is what it is. This would have been a much higher rating but upon closer inspection while I was taking photos for this review I noticed one of them had been broken and someone simply glued it back together! But other than the color being slightly off and the single damaged coaster, they are lovely! I just had a bit of bad luck is all.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Gant

customer_reviews.title: Good looking coasters, but they have their drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I like the coasters, although after a while of using them, the wood has become slightly paler, like washed out. The holder for the coasters isn't exactly sturdy, as the arms are actually a little loose. I've never had a problem with glasses slipping off the coasters, but the coasters do tend to stick to the bottom of the glass when you go to take a drink. Would've been better if the coasters were a bit heavier, to fix the sticking problem, and if the holder was better constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Rose anthony

customer_reviews.title: Small area to rest your cup and a bit lopsided.
customer_reviews.text: These are wood, that's true. They are also tiny and relatively sloped making for precarious perching of beverages on them. Granted you aren't spending much money and they look decent. They have a giant burned-in logo on the back as well, sort of ugly. They really out to put rubber feet on them. You get what you paid for in this case, not really much more to say than that.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Underside is not smooth
customer_reviews.text: For the price I don't mean to be overly critical, but these look like something you'd get a the dollar store. That's fine, I did not expect quality, but I've written this to let folks know that there is no felt on the underside of these coasters, and the surface is not especially smooth. These are perfectly serviceable coasters for rustic furniture or glass surfaces. However, the rough underside will put superficial scratches on fine furniture so I would advise avoiding using them on any nice wood surface you wish to really protect.
customer_reviews.author: bonedocTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but cheaply made and slippery
customer_reviews.text: I bought in for the low price and the high ratings, I should have paid more attention to the critical reviews. They're a decent size and the material quality is okay. On the down side, the routing on top (the lines that make the concentric circles) are shoddy, they were just carved out and not smooth, so they look splintered. These coasters are also very slick, so if you put them on a smooth surface they slide easily, which I could see leading to putting a drink down cock-eyed and causing a spill.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cordeiro

customer_reviews.title: 4 Beautiful coasters with a cherry finish
customer_reviews.text: Wooden coasters made of acacia that are very light and easy to match with any decoration. They were bought to avoid stains on my tablecloth. They also replace saucers for coffee and tea cups.Ech measures 4" diameter x 5/8" high and is easy to wash by hand. I dry them immediately as it is wood and I do not want them to be deformed. Good price and very entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: VeroTop Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: Not the best...
customer_reviews.text: These don't work well with hot drinks. The water appears on the bottom. I'm glad I did not put this on any wood Surfaces or it would of destroy it. Also the coasters are not durable to the liquid I already some damage affect after 2 uses. It is also a very large coaster. It is bulky but doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: fredstar

customer_reviews.title: You’ll end up buying a different set
customer_reviews.text: The condensation just sits on top of the coaster so when you lift your cup up it lift a split second and then smash to the table make a disruptive noise. It’s also a pain because it then needs to be repositioned.
customer_reviews.author: Joliene

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy holder and poorly functioning coasters
customer_reviews.text: The holder shipped already falling apart, and the coasters aren't very functional. If the glass sweats, the water pools at the bottom and spills over. Moreover, the water causes the coasters to stick to the glass when you pick it up. The coasters are just light enough to lift off the table, and then fall off and crash back down on the table, which is very annoying. Not at all recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Adams

customer_reviews.title: If only 0 stars was an option
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to get some nice looking coasters that would be an upgrade from my old ones, holy s*** was I wrong. I assumed that, since they're coasters, they were designed to put damp things on. About the fifth time I picked up my glass the coaster came all the way to my lap with it. The only way I could use them was to cover them in a napkin so they didn't stick, kind of defeats the purpose of a coaster right? If that wasn't enough, after one day of use they already look like s***. Apparently these were only designed for setting things on them that dont require coasters in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: will stanek

customer_reviews.title: Convenient holder to stack the coasters and I like the fact that it's wood
customer_reviews.text: Convenient holder to stack the coasters and I like the fact that it's wood. Dries pretty quickly and haven't had issues with mildew...yet :) I live in a pretty humid environment so we'll see how these hold up to the test of time. I have other bamboo products and find that if you spray with Clorox and let soak, then rinse thoroughly it works for getting out smells and mildew that eventually sets in. Bamboo is great and I love wood products - better than plastic any day in my book.
customer_reviews.author: KKSY

customer_reviews.title: No weight ! Smh
customer_reviews.text: They are nice. But they have no weight to them! Defeats the purpose of them because if you pick up a cup that has been sitting and built up water from at the base from the "sweating", the coaster will stick to the bottom of the cup and fall off. Needs some weight so this won't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: The Worst!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!! And who has time to ship back due to this pandemic!! It arrived broken into pieces!! So disappointed!! Do not buy!! ⛑⛑
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but the stand is not sturdy as it should be
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking coaster set for dining table. The 3 wood handle are not sturdy and just glued together. I bought another one to check and was still the same. Overall like this set. You can always hot glue if it comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Heet

customer_reviews.title: They started growing mold and would stick to the bottom of glasses.
customer_reviews.text: If you didn't separate your cold glasses from them with a paper towel, the condensation would cause the coasters to stick to the glasses and they would ride about halfway up before falling off and slamming back on the table. Also didn't take long for mold to start growing on them. This was in Florida, so maybe they work better in a dry climate?
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great, minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these coasters, but I am so sad to say that I don't feel the same about the holder. The three wood slats seemed really fragile when I first got the product and soon the broke off, one after the other. BUT, the coaster are GREAT! I love them so much! They are beautiful AND actually work (which is usually rare in a coaster).
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Do not expose to moisture
customer_reviews.text: These Acacia coasters look good but not intended for high moisture. We have one in particular that gets used a lot and it warped very quick. These would be good for short term use at dinner. Also the base is too small for most of our glassware. All being said I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Fell part when I opened it.....total junk. Outside coaster holder attached with staples....not secure at all. Coasters have NO BACKING....FELT ON THE BACK. TOTAL JUNK...DONT WASTE MONEY.. I WOULD SEND BACK BUT NOT WORTH MY TIME AND GAS....
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hempstead

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way they look but when I received them ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way they look but when I received them the box they sit in was broken - i had to re-glue and tape it
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Mikulics

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of these coaster. The price was very, very reasonable. The people claiming they don't absorb water, what did they expect, they are made of wood. I usually only use 2 of the coasters at a time. After a month or 2, I will wipe with Murphy's Oil. Getting in the groves is a minor problem. Then I put the 2 that I have cleaned on the bottom of the holder. This way, they all get used and should after a few years, all look the same from wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Hairy Harry

customer_reviews.title: Love these 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice! They look authentic and arrived as expected! Would recommend and buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough, for the price
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are functional and attractive enough. The good: Glasses wont stick to these coasters. The circular grooves help break the water tension and prevent sticking. I like how they look, and the holder is nice. The less good: The finish on them is pretty rough. It appears as if they didn't do any sanding after the grooves/rings were cut, so they have a pretty rough/cheap looking finish It would be nice if there was some sort of felt on the bottom of the coasters to ensure they wont scratch furniture. Not that I've had any problems yet, it would just be a nice extra touch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty decent coasters. I bought them a few months ago and the finish has already started to come off of them. It would be nice if they were sealed a little better. The other thing is that the the connection of the 3 posts that hold the coasters stack in place is kind of flimsy, I feel that with very little force i could break one off. For $10 they are a pretty good deal but they could be better.
customer_reviews.author: novice

customer_reviews.title: Great convenient set of coasters
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bamboo coaster set for our neighbors’ backyard porch. They loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: These are very lightweight. The only thing is that if they get anything sticky they do get stained which i dont like. Very durable though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: These are huge! No worry with oversized mugs.
customer_reviews.text: These are huge! Good news is that they appear to be well made bad news that that don't fit where I had planned to put them. However, With some of my mugs being extra wide, I no longer have to worry about exactly how I put them on the coaster.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Biz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bamboo Coaster Set
customer_reviews.text: These are great coasters. They are a little lighter colored than in the picture, but otherwise exactly the same. They are perfect little coasters and you don't have to worry about any condensation rolling off them and onto your table. The little circle grooves are great for keeping the condensation from spreading. I highly recommend these coasters, especially if you like the bamboo style items.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L

customer_reviews.title: Coasters themselves are fine. Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: The holder is flimsy, the pieces aren't connected very well. Its loose, and I don't imagine it'll be in one piece for much longer. Coasters themselves are fine. Nothing special, but it is nice to have them around when they are needed.
customer_reviews.author: shalb

customer_reviews.title: Tree Bark Coasters Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: The coasters arrived sooner than expected and were very good quality. Exceeded my expectations. I ordered these as a stocking stuffer for my teenage daughter who is going with a minimalist theme in her room. We are going to use these to set her small potted air plants and smaller indoor plants.
customer_reviews.author: Ebreeze38

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet lovely
customer_reviews.text: These coasters arrived over the weekend, and they are lovely. The simple clean lines of these coasters make them ideal for both casual and more formal tables, and the engraved rings themselves prevent perspiring glasses from sticking. I am a bit worried about how they will wear given their light weight (a bit of a surprise) and the instructions to wash them so delicately. I will update if any problems arise.
customer_reviews.author: K Ford

customer_reviews.title: These are great for the price, but they are not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These coasters look really nice when they are brand new, but once you start to use them, they start to lose their color as water is absorbed into it. These were very cheap and are doing a great job for their intended purpose. You can just tell that they are not the nicest out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended to protect your surfaces from staining. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended to protect your surfaces from staining. Being made from wood, these can stain themselves over time, but I would rather that happen to these than the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Sydbey

customer_reviews.title: I like these, bought two sets
customer_reviews.text: I like these, bought two sets, the price was right also. Only problem is as you use them the coating on the wood fades. Not a big deal for us, but something you should know. I would purchase again if price remained approximately the same.
customer_reviews.author: larwis

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! They add a perfect touch to my rustic decor. But it also beats using ceramic or plastic coasters! Drinks do not leave any water marks or seem to break down the wood at all! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Monica Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Rustic
customer_reviews.text: Cute and useful. Split the set with my daughter, she loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn W

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: this is a great set. the only down side is that there is no cork on the underside and glasses tend to stick if they cover the rings. I was able to solve that issue with a hand held electrical saw by making additional cuts in an asterisk shape. I do recommend picking up some bamboo/wood oil to preserve them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This was not a good purchase yes
customer_reviews.text: This was not a good purchase yes. It does not soak water from your glass up. When you pick your glass up the thing sticks to it and then Falls on the table. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like how different they are and how we have a tree theme. My boyfriend loves the look of them. They are super cute and don’t scratch the table.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to clean it yet... So far so good! Love that they are real wood. Flat, so they don't teeter when you set a glass on it. Great quality. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amzngrl

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold moisture at all. I have to place a tissue or paper towel under my drink before placing my item on the coaster. The holder itself is not put together very well. Not sturdy and seems easily breakable. Hasn't broken yet! So, that's a plus
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chapman

customer_reviews.title: They look very good!
customer_reviews.text: We dont really use coasters much and I keep mine in my den for when friends comes by. They are more for looks than function. They look nice and they are 4.5" across. Only kick I have is they are much lighter color, At a glance they look like pine. And they look good on amazon but the ones I got dont have rounded edges. Look like they were made fast. Only details are 3 shallow rings cut into the tops. But I do like the bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Glass sticks to it.
customer_reviews.text: A cold wet glass will stick to the coaster and it falls to the floor when you lift the glass. The bamboo does not break but it causes a lot of noise. I thought the groove would prevent this. Other than this they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. I have natural bamboo floors throughout my home and these look so great on the tables. The holder is well made. The coasters themselves are exactly what I was expecting. There isn't felt on the back which was fine with me but I could see someone seeing it as a draw back.
customer_reviews.author: Becca of AMZ

customer_reviews.title: It would be fine if you have a different craft in mind
customer_reviews.text: These were much smaller than pictured and not even within the smallest of the range. They were way too small to use as coasters. We had to contact the seller and they issued a refund for this product. It would be fine if you have a different craft in mind, but the set we received were MUCH smaller than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: RF1323

customer_reviews.title: Rustic looking and natural
customer_reviews.text: I used this for awhile then I gave it as a gift to a friend that was using paper-towels on a lid. She loves them, as did I. Cannot tell I used them first. Absorbs glass sweat and dries invisibly.
customer_reviews.author: Kkatydid

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these coasters at many houses I have been a guest at...my stupid glass coasters kept getting stuck to the bottoms of my cups and would fall and break... If these fall, who cares. I haven't had them stick to any cups anyway so they are working great.
customer_reviews.author: fryphish

customer_reviews.title: Not for Large Cold Glassware
customer_reviews.text: There is no lip on the edge, so condensate runs down onto the table. This happens quickly with a large glass. Otherwise, it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: slavid

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about coasters? Well, for one thing, they are the perfect size - wide enough to fit around even the largest cups and lightweight. They are also very easy to wipe down after condensation has built up on the surface. All-in-all I am quite pleased/
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Ari

customer_reviews.title: They're good but a bit on a large side
customer_reviews.text: Really liked them, however they ended up being way larger than expected (so be prepared, aren't regular small drink coasters)
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep the condensation from pouring all over the table like a lot of other coasters allow. They do the job
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L Wood

customer_reviews.title: Nice coasters!
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of these before and liked them. They were neutral, not too flashy, but sturdy and didn't scratch the table. This set I bought for my mother for Christmas and she loves them. She keeps telling me how much she loves them. So these are highly recommended by both of us. We especially like the holding case they can go in.
customer_reviews.author: See Sea

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: Had these now for over a year and use them everyday. Still in mint shape. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: i painted over these for a gift for my boyfriend and he loved them! even unpainted they were super cute and high quality. glad i purchased them!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great, but Much lighter in color than shown!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these coasters, however, just as a warning, they are much lighter in color than I was expecting. The stand that holds all the coasters was also a little rough as though it hadn't been sanded or crafted very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Grindstaff

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Fit in fabulously with my rustic décor and didn't scratch my furniture. So far, wet cups, glasses don't seem to stick to them wither.
customer_reviews.author: BRWNNTWN

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: These are durable and do the job perfectly. Easy to clean up and hard to miss with a cup or glass. No problem whatsoever and the price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Good as is
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to buy another set and realized there are some bad reviews. So here's my experience. I've been using this set for a long time. It's perfect for my need. It won't scratch countertops, won't break when dropped on the ground, and can take on very hot bottoms. A lot other reviews are complaining about water absorption issues. To be frank, it is a bamboo coaster. Why would anyone expect it to absorb a puddle of water from condensation?
customer_reviews.author: David Tang

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and nice
customer_reviews.text: They look so good and help to protect the table from the water release by bottles and glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Ank

customer_reviews.title: Still good.
customer_reviews.text: They are still good after some time. (i think its been almost a year or more) I use one or two almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh.

customer_reviews.title: They're nice and decorative
customer_reviews.text: They're nice and decorative. It'll protect your furniture from getting moisture from your drink...somewhat. The moisture still stays on top the coaster and does not absorb at all. So if you have a lot of condensation on your coaster and you move it, it could spill onto your furniture. After a month of use, the coaster seems to be losing its stain luster as well.

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo is The Best
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I got them for Christmas and they seem to be made solidly. I like bamboo, because it is Eco-Friendly. These have a nice finish on them, however, I wish they had some kind of non stick bottom. They sometimes slide across my glass coffee table. I may add son cork to the bottom soon.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brandeiz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for coasters.
customer_reviews.text: Nice coasters. They work well for drinks. The ridges help absorb any moisture so your glass or cup doesn't stick to the coaster, which is nice. I don't end of bringing the coaster along up with my drink. Defiantly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ranchcop

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not for use in high humidity areas, does not wick away the water.
customer_reviews.author: Lazybones

customer_reviews.title: Wish to view all four if buying ever again.
customer_reviews.text: The top two coasters were beautiful, but the bottom two were just ordinary. I didn't pay for ordinary, I paid for the lovely top two. Very disappointed. Don't want to think this was just a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Mottie

customer_reviews.title: Better than the cork coasters I had previously
customer_reviews.text: Better than the cork coasters I had previously. Reason I replaced them is because my 5 year old nephew snapped them in half. He's not going to be able to snap these in half. haha
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the "Cabin Look"
customer_reviews.text: You would think a coaster is a coaster.. I got these cause they were cheap and happened to match the areas where they are. As far as actual functionality they work fine, they just get dirty fast..
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Glackin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: we bought a lot of these, if liquid falls on them they crack and come apart. quality so so
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Siu

customer_reviews.title: Well made, useful and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews (as usual) and bought these coasters. They are very well made and quite functional. They may not be the perfect coaster for large frosted mugs but the work fine for me. The holder is sturdy and well made and it looks great on my table. Fast shipping and great price. Think I'll buy a few for stocking stuffers. For some picky people it may not be your thing but in general a great coaster set.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: After almost a year of use the varnish came off most of my coasters. These coasters do not shed water and thus suffer the consequences of varnish wear.
customer_reviews.author: AKL_HBG

customer_reviews.title: these look pretty nice. I would not expect these to be ...
customer_reviews.text: For being so cheap, these look pretty nice. I would not expect these to be $6 or whatever I paid if I saw these at someone's house.
customer_reviews.author: bbbb

customer_reviews.title: Coloring Is Off
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems nice enough, but these coasters don't have the same natural coloring as the product shots. Mine are super yellow! Photo has no filter or saturation added
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy these. Everything leaks through. At first I thought my husband was spilling all the time but it happened to me right now. And of course I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My husband, who is the pickiest man alive and never notices anything commented on how much he likes these coasters. I wasn't expecting much, as they are after all just coasters. But I'm pleasantly surprised. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what you can say about coasters...they are functional, and a very nice match to other bamboo products I have in my kitchen. Classier than a lot of coasters I have seen...and I like there being a set of 6 instead of so many coaster sets I have seen that contain only 4.
customer_reviews.author: Bensalem Al

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The coasters are nicely finished, well constructed, and look nice. The holder has grippy non scratch pads on the bottom. If you are using a glass that sweats a lot it will eventually run off the side since the grooves are not deep and there is no lip. Some of my glasses have come close, but it hasn't actually happened yet.
customer_reviews.author: figuy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for practical use. Not exceptionally pretty but natural and basic, just as I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dijana Mujkanovic

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love these coasters. The rack makes it so simple for guest to just pick one up to use. The wood doesn't stain from condensation. I love these and will order more if mine get worn down.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, but will stick to your glass
customer_reviews.text: I opted for these coasters instead of glass coasters because I didn't want a coaster that would suction to the bottom of a glass with condensation, but I didn't get what I was looking for. These coasters are fine with mugs and hot beverages and tall stemware, and they are attractive, but when condensation drips down to the base of a glass, it will stick so that when you lift the glass the coaster comes with it for a few seconds, and then drops back onto the table.
customer_reviews.author: S. Slevinski

customer_reviews.title: Cute, a little rustic, and perfectly functional.
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was hoping for. Cute, kind of rustic, nice and thick, and totally functional. I like how they look all stacked up on the table when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Work great for protecting my tables from the evils of sweaty ...
customer_reviews.text: Work great for protecting my tables from the evils of sweaty beers and other various drinks. They haven't absorb the mositure and look like I just bought them a year later. Good price, fast shipping, A+.
customer_reviews.author: incognito

customer_reviews.title: Holds up great
customer_reviews.text: I've had my set for two years. I don't oil them down every week like you should with bamboo but they are doing fine. I do oil them when they start looking dry, about once a month or so. I've had no problem with mold like I've seen on other bamboo/wood kitchen products that I've owned. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: didn't expect the color to be that light but i guess they are ok
customer_reviews.author: I_bought_it

customer_reviews.title: i think you might be better off with soft coasters
customer_reviews.text: one dropped and it broke in half. i think you might be better off with soft coasters. these look nice, but they stick to the glasses when they get wet and the water beads and rolls onto the table anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: The holder has lots of splintered wood.
customer_reviews.text: I unwrapped the package. It was wrapped in plastic. When I picked up the coasters, I immediately got to splinters stuck in my finger from the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Cicole

customer_reviews.title: False advertising- no holder i cluded
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased with this product at all. The description clearly states that there is a holder yet it did not come with one. This is false advertising!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid, my german Sheppard took a nibble on one and they stood up with minimal damage. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: One sided
customer_reviews.text: Nice on one side. Company logo on the other side so can not flip over to use other side unless you want to see the company logo engraved on it. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Have used them briefly but appear to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Have used them briefly but appear to be of good quality. They should hold up if not abused! Sturdily built!
customer_reviews.author: LIT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my cabin and wood table I made! Love it A++
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great coaster set that is very durable and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: silicawood

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and looks very nice quality. Sturdier than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Much lighter in color than the photo indicates, but still nice enough
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter in color once you receive them than they are in the photo, which is a little disappointing. They are still attractive though, and they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Erin King

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: When they get wet from condensation on a cold glass the finish is faded.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how thick these were when I got them. But they work great and I'd buy them again! They're very aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jopson

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Definitely less rounded in the sides than in the pictures, but it works well. Looks weird after a while when it gets random color changes from water.
customer_reviews.author: J. Deng

customer_reviews.title: Not as described...
customer_reviews.text: While the product quality itself is not bad, they omit to tell you there is a GIANT logo on the back. If you are looking for something nice, without unwanted advertisement, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this coaster set
customer_reviews.text: Love it. bought these to protect my new coffee table. They work great. I like the little ridges because condensation can drip into them instead of spilling onto my table. LOVE that it came with a holder. That was something I really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: not the best quality, but it is okay
customer_reviews.text: It works, not the best quality, but it is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Attila

product_meta.title: Lipper International Bamboo Wood Round Coasters and Caddy, 7-Piece Set
product_meta.description: Style Name:Set of 6 Round Coasters and 1 Holder| Color:Bamboo WoodLipper International provides exceptionally valued items for the kitchen, home, office, and child's playroom. Known for their functionality and beauty, each of our products is individually crafted from the finest quality materials. Protect tables and counter-tops with this elegant set of Bamboo Wood Coasters. Hand wash with a mild soap and cool water. Do not soak. Do not put in the dishwasher, microwave or refrigerator. Extreme changes in temperature will cause the material to crack over time. Dry thoroughly. Occasional use of mineral oil on the inside will help maintain its appearance.
feature_bullets: Beautiful bamboo wood coasters are an elegant way to protect your tables and countertops
Coasters nestle in matching caddy, ensuring they look great even when not in use
Made from bamboo wood, a natural and renewable resource that is easy to care for and maintain - Hand wash only
Set of 6 coasters and 1 coaster holder - Item Dimensions: Each coaster: 4 1/4" diameter x 1/2" high; Coaster holder: 5 1/4" diameter x 2 7/8"

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
